desc: Bushies Firewood Sales is a locally owned and operated Ballarat business. We have been involved in the firewood industry for over 20 years and are committed to the long term future of firewood retailing. We have made significant investments in infrastructure over recent years and we continue to increase

DELIVERIES AVAILABLE SIX DAYS A WEEK
PLEASE CHECK OPENING HOURS FOR PICK UP SERVICE
Heating Supplies are an essential item, and as we provide a contactless "Covid Safe" service, we will be operating as normal during the current Covid -19 Pandemic.
